Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Fission Reactor^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;裂变反应堆^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Great! Try this ^orange;advanced dash tech^reset; out and let me know if it works properly!
Texts.Chs: 太棒了！我将会把^orange空中冲刺 II^reset;传授于你。

Texts.Eng: You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and you can have ^green;this tech upgrade^reset; I just came up with.
Texts.Chs: 如果你的设备电力非常稀缺，那么我建议你建造一个^orange;裂变反应堆^reset;，它会给你提供成吨的电力。赶快去建造一台吧，你可以在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中制造它。
